definition: Luchuan county in Yulin 玉林[Yu4 lin2], Guangxi
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
Luchuan county in Yulin 玉林[Yu4 lin2], Guangxi

sentences.english: MR. LU’S fascination with war came from eight years of service in the Chinese Army.
sentences.chinese: 陸川對於戰爭的着迷緣於他當了八年兵。

sentences.english: Lu's assistant later told a reporter that the "filmmaker" referred to Yan.
sentences.chinese: 後來陸川的助理透露給記者這個電影工作者就是鄢頗。

sentences.english: Will it comfort Lu Chuan's dark view of humanity?
sentences.chinese: 這部電影會讓陸川人性中悲觀看法得到舒展嗎？

sentences.english: Lu said he enjoyed answering questions about his previous work, "Kekexili, " a 2004 drama about antelope poachers.
sentences.chinese: 陸川稱他很樂意回答關於他上部作品的問題。

sentences.english: Mr. Lu said he hoped it would be distributed in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 陸川說他希望影片能在日本上映。

sentences.english: War, Mr. Lu realized, crushes even the victors.
sentences.chinese: 陸川意識到，戰爭甚至把勝利者也打垮了。

definition: Danny Lee Sau-Yin (1953-), Hong Kong actor and director
female warrior role in Chinese opera
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
Gordon Liu (1955-), Hong Kong action actor
Jiang Wenli (1969-), award-winning PRC film actress
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
venturing from one's thatched hut for the first time (idiom)/young and inexperienced/novice/greenhorn
The Butterfly Lovers, Chinese folktale of the tragic love between Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai
pinyin: Liang2 Shan1 bo2 yu3 Zhu4 Ying1 tai2
